Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Public Safety, Committee on Higher Education and the Committee on Women's Issues

Items.Title: Oversight - Sexual Assault on New York City College Campuses.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Sexual Assault on New York City College Campuses.

Items.Title: Resolution urging Congress to pass and President Obama to sign S. 2692/H.R. 5354, also known as the Campus Accountability and Safety Act.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Public Safety, Committee on Higher Education and the Committee on Women's Issues

Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass and the President to sign H.R. 5277/S.2695, also known as the Survivor Outreach and Support Campus Act, which would amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to have an independent advocate for campus sexual assault prevention and response.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Survivor Outreach and Support Campus Act (H.R. 5277/S.2695)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Gibson, Cumbo, Williams, Barron, Crowley, Vacca, King, Kallos, Rosenthal, Cabrera, Espinal, Gentile, Cornegy, Rodriguez, Ferreras, Dickens, Cohen, Deutsch, Matteo and the Public Advocate (Ms. James)

Items.Title: Oversight - Sexual Assault on New York City College Campuses.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Sexual Assault on New York City College Campuses.

Items.Title: Resolution urging Congress to pass and President Obama to sign S. 2692/H.R. 5354, also known as the Campus Accountability and Safety Act.
